  • Constructor Details

    • Settings

      public Settings(int numExits, int numPlayers, int numRemedies, int numZombies, int zombieSleep, int numItems, int numObstacles, boolean hasCustomSettings, boolean hasPortals)
      Constructs a Settings element depending on input.
      Parameters:
      numExits - amount of exits.
      numPlayers - amount of players.
      numRemedies - amount of remedies.
      numZombies - amount of zombies.
      zombieSleep - rounds that the zombies will sleep.
      numItems - amount of items.
      numObstacles - amount of obstacles.
      hasCustomSettings - true, if game has custom settings.
      hasPortals - true, if game has portals.

    • Settings

      public Settings(Difficulties difficulty)
      Constructs a Settings element depending on the chosen difficulty.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - chosen difficulty (easy, medium or hard).

      public Settings()
